name: sms-app
description: API to manage student and teacher records

scripts.prep-prod: npm run server-prep-prod && node ./build/taskRunner.js && cd dist && zip -r  sms-app .
scripts.dev: npm run server-prep-prod && node ./build/taskRunner.js && cd dist && npm run start
scripts.test: npm run server-prep-prod && node ./build/taskRunner.js && mocha --require babel-core/register --bail  test/**/*.js
